list_definition.definition: to cause (a liquid stir) to be mixed especially by the constant circular movement of a spoon etc, in order to mix it

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He put sugar and milk into his tea and stirred it
She stirred the sugar into the mixture.

list_definition.definition: to move, either slightly or vigorously
to arouse or touch (a person or his feelings)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was stirred by her story.

list_ex_of_english: The vial was stirred using a magnetic stirrer for 5 min at 300 rpm and then 5 min at 150 rpm.
Perhaps the target article's stirring call for appropriate comparative methods will attract readers to research cited in this commentary.
